div.p: MGE was the principal investigator on the grant from which the data for this manuscript was obtained, and contributed to the theoretical background and conceptualization of the study, item development, study design, writing, data analysis, and editing. EMT contributed to the data collection, data analysis, and writing, and editing. JH and MS contributed to the conceptualization, writing, and editing. GAA contributed theoretical background and conceptualization of the study, item development, study design, and editing. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
